push.f90

00001  
00002 !  ===============================================================
00003 !
00004 !                           PMOVE
00005 !
00006 !   Update particle positions - used with leap-frog scheme
00007 !
00008 !  ===============================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine push_x(ips,ipf,delt)
00011 
00012   use physvars
00013   use treevars
00014   integer, intent(in) :: ips, ipf  ! 1st and last particle numbers
00015   real, intent(in) :: delt
00016   integer :: i,p
00017   real :: gamma, r_glue2, dx, dy, dz, dr2
00018 
00019   r_glue2 = (max(xl,yl,zl)*glue_radius)**2
00020 
00021   !  relativistic particle push in space
00022 
00023   do p=ips,ipf
00024 ! find radius from plasma_centre
00025      dx = x(p)-plasma_centre(1)
00026      dy = y(p)-plasma_centre(2)
00027      dz = z(p)-plasma_centre(3)
00028      dr2 = dx**2+dy**2+dz**2
00029      if (dr2 < r_glue2 ) then 
00030        gamma = sqrt(1.0 + ux(p)**2 + uy(p)**2 + uz(p)**2)
00031        x(p)=x(p)+ux(p)/gamma*delt
00032        y(p)=y(p)+uy(p)/gamma*delt
00033        if (idim==3) z(p)=z(p)+uz(p)/gamma*delt
00034      else
00035 !       if (mod(me,200).eq.0) write(*,*) "particle ",p," glued at ",sqrt(dr2)
00036         ! leave particle where it is (should flag it to remove from force lists)
00037      endif
00038   end do
00039 
00040 end subroutine push_x
